image.alt: There is text on the top, saying, 'Now Featuring... The Mine Trap!' Below, there is a box filled with dynamite as well as a Miner hat. At the bottom, there is a 5 star rating with text underneath saying, 'Our Signature Room.'

There is text on the top, saying, 'Pirate Booty' Below, there is a wooden chest sorrounded by gold coins, as if stacked on a mountain of treasure. The chest is wrapped in chains, with a padlock keeping the chians tight.

There is text on the top in red, saying, 'The Parlor'. Below, there is gray text, reading, 'A who-dunit'. On the right, there is a man in a hat and trench coat, standing in a a lit doorway. He is casting an ominous shadow over a chalk-outline of a body from a murder scene.
The image reads, 'Where in the world is Phil Landcaster?' In the center, there is a globe, covered by a sketch of a man in a detective hat and trench coat.
